## IKeyLoader.load() method

loads file as a byte array

**Signature:**

```typescript
load(path: string): Promise<Uint8Array>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | string | path to file |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Uint8Array&gt;

`Promise<Uint8Array>`
